title: code_check script shouldn't check deps folder

content.raw:
The deps folder code isn't subject to our style guide, so we shouldn't check subject it to the same standards as the gazebo code.
~~~
$ tools/bitbucket_pullrequests -c 1001
checking pull request 1001, branch ode_gearbox
Need to merge branch ode_gearbox with 82221aae2614
deps/opende/include/ode/objects.h:69:  Extra space before ( in function call  [whitespace/parens] [4]
deps/opende/include/ode/objects.h:80:  Extra space before ( in function call  [whitespace/parens] [4]
deps/opende/include/ode/objects.h:87:  Extra space before ( in function call  [whitespace/parens] [4]
...
~~~
